Nightshift stops short and backs up, opening the door for Elita on the driv=
er's side.
" That's right, I can't diss your mom now can I?  Make sure ya b=
uckle in good so ya stay safe.  And if Leo Prime says anything I'll take th=
e rap for it.  Maan Rodimus is gonna have me by the hubcaps if he ever find=
s out that I'm do'n this. Which is why your Uncle Nightshift doesn't make a=
 good example as a responsible guardian."

Perpetually on the move and cons=
tantly busy.

otmail.com> wrote:

>  
> =E2=80=9CWait!! wait !!! Mom told me t=
hat I have to be together you!!!=E2=80=9DSaid th egirl while she tried to r=

sis

> Nightshift get=
s the message and rubs Elita on the head, then bows in Ninja fashion. 
>  
=
> " fantastic start for a beginner.  I'm sorry ta end class so fast but, I =
got called ta duty . I'll catch up with ya later, I promise."
>  
> With th=
at, he gets back into vehicle form and rolls out of the Medic Bay.
> 
> Per=
petually on the move and constantly busy.
>

egan his training of the young maximal a message came

>>=

>> which BUMP quickly shut off as he fed in a few commands. The systems
>>=
 began to hum again as green lights once again appeared.
>> 
>> "It was not=
hing." BUMP said as he turned to look back at ELITA and
>> NIGHTSHIFT, "Rem=
ember she requested a fuzor form, they were created
>> because of a mistake=
 in beast mode creation subroutines when their
>> ship crash landed. We jus=
t had to recreate that."
>> 
>> He glanced back at NIGHTLIGHT's CR chamber =
and nodded, "All is going
>> well. She should be done shortly." The CR cham=
ber hummed along
>> pleasently, its timer continuing to count down.
>>
